summary: The 'Achieving Thorough Transparency and Accessibility for Information Navigation on Mental Health Act of 2025' mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to create and maintain an interactive, web-based dashboard for public access to federal grant information related to mental health and substance use disorders. The dashboard will be designed to comply with the Americans with Disabilities Act, and it will include search functions, grant data, and links to program information. The Secretary is required to consult various stakeholders, and the dashboard will integrate state-provided data voluntarily.
